original_command: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive

evasions.insertion: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive # bypass
evasions.substitution: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive
evasions.omission: wmic product where name= call uninstall /nointeractive
evasions.reordering: wmic where product name= call uninstall /nointeractive
